metadata.title: Camera Necktie - Photography Necktie - Camera tie - Photographer tie - Photographer Necktie - Men's Photography Gift - Maker V Exlusive, Grey, Standard
features: Designed exclusively by Maker V. Â  We are a small family-owned business based in San Diego, CA. As artists with a passion for creativity & simplicity, we take pride in bringing you our exclusive necktie designs!
High end look & feel - Cameras are embroidered onto fabric. Light grey background with black Pi Symbol Motif
Perfect gift for a camera man or photographer! Our brand exclusive.
Measures slightly narrower 2 3/4" wide for a more modern look - Standard 58" in length.
description: 100% Handmade Necktie. Features grey background with Black embroidered camera motif. Slightly narrower than a classic tie, measures 2.75" wide for a modern look and feel (this is 1/4" narrower than a standard tie, and wider than most "skinny ties." ) Subtle and Professional - makes the perfect gift for the photographer in your life. Tie is handmade of 100% Microfiber - has a high-end look and feel. Tie features loop on back. Standard length.

title: Josh Bach Neckwear - Unique Neckwear, Uncommon by Design
